attributes.comment:
It is unfortunate that families wishing to adopt have yet another unnecessary
obstacle to face. Adoption is extremely expensive as it is. Adoption is NOT an
easy road. The proposed increase of fees by up to 66% is simply unconscionable.
People wishing to adopt are being penalized unfairly. This will only contribute to
more families becoming discouraged by the process of adoption. In turn more
children will be waiting for a loving home. The USCIS needs to rethink the
increase. It is a huge increase which feels like a slap in the face for those of us
wishing to complete our families.


Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Kelli
